00061 static void outliner_main_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00062 {
00063     ListBase *lb;
00064     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00065     
00066     UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_LIST, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00067     
00068     /* own keymap */
00069     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Outliner", SPACE_OUTLINER, 0);
00070     /* don't pass on view2d mask, it's always set with scrollbar space, hide fails */
00071     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, NULL, &ar->winrct);
00072 
00073     /* Add dropboxes */
00074     lb = WM_dropboxmap_find("Outliner", SPACE_OUTLINER, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00075     WM_event_add_dropbox_handler(&ar->handlers, lb);
00076 }
00077 
00078 static int outliner_parent_drop_poll(bContext *C, wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *event)
00079 {
00080     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00081     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00082     TreeElement *te= NULL;
00083     float fmval[2];
00084     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &fmval[0], &fmval[1]);
00085 
00086     if (drag->type == WM_DRAG_ID) {
00087         ID *id = (ID *)drag->poin;
00088         if ( GS(id->name) == ID_OB ) {
00089             /* Ensure item under cursor is valid drop target */
00090             /* Find object hovered over */
00091             for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00092                 TreeElement *te_valid;
00093                 te_valid= outliner_dropzone_parent(C, event, te, fmval);
00094                 if (te_valid) return 1;
00095             }
00096         }
00097     }
00098     return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 static void outliner_parent_drop_copy(wmDrag *drag, wmDropBox *drop)
00102 {
00103     ID *id = (ID *)drag->poin;
00104 
00105     RNA_string_set(drop->ptr, "child", id->name+2);
00106 }
00107 
00108 static int outliner_parent_clear_poll(bContext *C, wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *event)
00109 {
00110     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00111     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00112     TreeElement *te= NULL;
00113     float fmval[2];
00114 
00115     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &fmval[0], &fmval[1]);
00116 
00117     if (drag->type == WM_DRAG_ID) {
00118         ID *id = (ID *)drag->poin;
00119         if ( GS(id->name) == ID_OB ) {
00120             //TODO: Check if no parent?
00121             /* Ensure location under cursor is valid dropzone */
00122             for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00123                 if (outliner_dropzone_parent_clear(C, event, te, fmval)) return 1;
00124             }
00125             /* Check if mouse cursor is below the tree */
00126             te= soops->tree.last;
00127             while (((te->flag & TE_LAZY_CLOSED)==0) && (te->subtree.last)) {
00128                 te= te->subtree.last;
00129             }
00130             if (fmval[1] < te->ys) return 1;
00131         }
00132     }
00133     return 0;
00134 }
00135 
00136 static void outliner_parent_clear_copy(wmDrag *drag, wmDropBox *drop)
00137 {
00138     ID *id = (ID *)drag->poin;
00139     RNA_string_set(drop->ptr, "dragged_obj", id->name+2);
00140 
00141     /* Set to simple parent clear type. Avoid menus for drag and drop if possible.
00142      * If desired, user can toggle the different "Clear Parent" types in the operator
00143      * menu on tool shelf. */
00144     RNA_enum_set(drop->ptr, "type", 0);
00145 }
00146 
00147 /* region dropbox definition */
00148 static void outliner_dropboxes(void)
00149 {
00150     ListBase *lb = WM_dropboxmap_find("Outliner", SPACE_OUTLINER, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00151 
00152     WM_dropbox_add(lb, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_drop", outliner_parent_drop_poll, outliner_parent_drop_copy);
00153     WM_dropbox_add(lb, "OUTLINER_OT_parent_clear", outliner_parent_clear_poll, outliner_parent_clear_copy);
00154 }

00156 static void outliner_main_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00157 {
00158     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00159     View2DScrollers *scrollers;
00160     
00161     /* clear */
00162     UI_ThemeClearColor(TH_BACK);
00163     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00164     
00165     draw_outliner(C);
00166     
00167     /* reset view matrix */
00168     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00169     
00170     /* scrollers */
00171     scrollers= UI_view2d_scrollers_calc(C, v2d, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY, V2D_ARG_DUMMY);
00172     UI_view2d_scrollers_draw(C, v2d, scrollers);
00173     UI_view2d_scrollers_free(scrollers);
00174 }

00179

00182 static void outliner_main_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00183 {
00184     /* context changes */
00185     switch(wmn->category) {
00186         case NC_SCENE:
00187             switch(wmn->data) {
00188                 case ND_OB_ACTIVE:
00189                 case ND_OB_SELECT:
00190                 case ND_OB_VISIBLE:
00191                 case ND_OB_RENDER:
00192                 case ND_MODE:
00193                 case ND_KEYINGSET:
00194                 case ND_FRAME:
00195                 case ND_RENDER_OPTIONS:
00196                 case ND_LAYER:
00197                 case ND_WORLD:
00198                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00199                     break;
00200             }
00201             break;
00202         case NC_OBJECT:
00203             switch(wmn->data) {
00204                 case ND_TRANSFORM:
00205                     /* transform doesn't change outliner data */
00206                     break;
00207                 case ND_BONE_ACTIVE:
00208                 case ND_BONE_SELECT:
00209                 case ND_DRAW:
00210                 case ND_PARENT:
00211                 case ND_OB_SHADING:
00212                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00213                     break;
00214                 case ND_CONSTRAINT:
00215                     switch(wmn->action) {
00216                         case NA_ADDED:
00217                         case NA_REMOVED:
00218                         case NA_RENAME:
00219                             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00220                             break;
00221                     }
00222                     break;
00223                 case ND_MODIFIER:
00224                     /* all modifier actions now */
00225                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00226                     break;
00227             }
00228             break;
00229         case NC_GROUP:
00230             /* all actions now, todo: check outliner view mode? */
00231             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00232             break;
00233         case NC_LAMP:
00234             /* For updating lamp icons, when changing lamp type */
00235             if (wmn->data == ND_LIGHTING_DRAW)
00236                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00237                 break;
00238         case NC_SPACE:
00239             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_OUTLINER)
00240                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00241                 break;
00242         case NC_ID:
00243             if (wmn->action == NA_RENAME)
00244                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00245             break;
00246         case NC_MATERIAL:
00247             switch(wmn->data) {
00248                 case ND_SHADING:
00249                 case ND_SHADING_DRAW:
00250                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00251                     break;
00252             }
00253             break;
00254         case NC_TEXTURE:
00255             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00256             break;
00257         case NC_GEOM:
00258             switch(wmn->data) {
00259                 case ND_DATA:
00260                     /* needed for vertex groups only, no special notifier atm so use NC_GEOM|ND_DATA */
00261                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00262                     break;
00263             }
00264             break;
00265         case NC_ANIMATION:
00266             switch(wmn->data) {
00267                 case ND_NLA_ACTCHANGE:
00268                 case ND_KEYFRAME:
00269                     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00270                     break;
00271                 case ND_ANIMCHAN:
00272                     if (wmn->action==NA_SELECTED)
00273                         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00274                     break;
00275             }
00276             break;
00277     }
00278     
00279 }

00299 static void outliner_header_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00300 {
00301     /* context changes */
00302     switch(wmn->category) {
00303         case NC_SCENE:
00304             if (wmn->data == ND_KEYINGSET)
00305                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00306             break;
00307         case NC_SPACE:
00308             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_OUTLINER)
00309                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00310             break;
00311     }
00312 }

00314 /* ******************** default callbacks for outliner space ***************** */
00315 
00316 static SpaceLink *outliner_new(const bContext *UNUSED(C))
00317 {
00318     ARegion *ar;
00319     SpaceOops *soutliner;
00320 
00321     soutliner= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceOops), "initoutliner");
00322     soutliner->spacetype= SPACE_OUTLINER;
00323     
00324     /* header */
00325     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "header for outliner");
00326     
00327     BLI_addtail(&soutliner->regionbase, ar);
00328     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00329     ar->alignment= RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00330     
00331     /* main area */
00332     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "main area for outliner");
00333     
00334     BLI_addtail(&soutliner->regionbase, ar);
00335     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00336     
00337     ar->v2d.scroll = (V2D_SCROLL_RIGHT|V2D_SCROLL_BOTTOM_O);
00338     ar->v2d.align = (V2D_ALIGN_NO_NEG_X|V2D_ALIGN_NO_POS_Y);
00339     ar->v2d.keepzoom = (V2D_LOCKZOOM_X|V2D_LOCKZOOM_Y|V2D_LIMITZOOM|V2D_KEEPASPECT);
00340     ar->v2d.keeptot= V2D_KEEPTOT_STRICT;
00341     ar->v2d.minzoom= ar->v2d.maxzoom= 1.0f;
00342     
00343     return (SpaceLink*)soutliner;
00344 }
00345 
00346 /* not spacelink itself */
00347 static void outliner_free(SpaceLink *sl)
00348 {
00349     SpaceOops *soutliner= (SpaceOops*)sl;
00350     
00351     outliner_free_tree(&soutliner->tree);
00352     if (soutliner->treestore) {
00353         if (soutliner->treestore->data) MEM_freeN(soutliner->treestore->data);
00354         MEM_freeN(soutliner->treestore);
00355     }
00356     
00357 }

00361 {
00362     
00363 }
00364 
00365 static SpaceLink *outliner_duplicate(SpaceLink *sl)
00366 {
00367     SpaceOops *soutliner= (SpaceOops *)sl;
00368     SpaceOops *soutlinern= MEM_dupallocN(soutliner);
00369 
00370     soutlinern->tree.first= soutlinern->tree.last= NULL;
00371     soutlinern->treestore= NULL;
00372     
00373     return (SpaceLink *)soutlinern;
00374 }

00376 /* only called once, from space_api/spacetypes.c */
00377 void ED_spacetype_outliner(void)
00378 {
00379     SpaceType *st= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceType), "spacetype time");
00380     ARegionType *art;
00381     
00382     st->spaceid= SPACE_OUTLINER;
00383     strncpy(st->name, "Outliner", BKE_ST_MAXNAME);
00384     
00385     st->new= outliner_new;
00386     st->free= outliner_free;
00387     st->init= outliner_init;
00388     st->duplicate= outliner_duplicate;
00389     st->operatortypes= outliner_operatortypes;
00390     st->keymap= outliner_keymap;
00391     st->dropboxes= outliner_dropboxes;
00392     
00393     /* regions: main window */
00394     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype time region");
00395     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00396     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D;
00397     
00398     art->init= outliner_main_area_init;
00399     art->draw= outliner_main_area_draw;
00400     art->free= outliner_main_area_free;
00401     art->listener= outliner_main_area_listener;
00402     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00403     
00404     /* regions: header */
00405     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype time region");
00406     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00407     art->prefsizey= HEADERY;
00408     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES|ED_KEYMAP_HEADER;
00409     
00410     art->init= outliner_header_area_init;
00411     art->draw= outliner_header_area_draw;
00412     art->free= outliner_header_area_free;
00413     art->listener= outliner_header_area_listener;
00414     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00415     
00416     BKE_spacetype_register(st);
00417 }
